version_description: Fixed interface for working on iPhone 5s

Meet RusVPN 2.0: 
- It has a fresh and modern design, app looks very great now!
- It's more faster and more stable now.
- We simplified our app! Now there is no need to register in order to use our app!
- It's more optimized, we are welcoming you to check it. Enjoy!

- It has a fresh and modern design, app looks very great now!
- It's more faster and more stable now.
- We simplified our app! Now there is no need to register in order to use our app!
- It's more optimized, we are welcoming you to check it. Enjoy!
